skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.actions.RestrainProduction
skill.description: For an agent to enact the action of restraining the production of a resource node.

parameter.name: resourceNode
parameter.description: The resource node to act on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of resource that will be temporary removed from the node capability of production.

feedback.name: restrainActionRunning
feedback.description: Sent once simulation action is running (production of resource is restrained with specified quantity).
